testimonials.text: Brendan promotes a high level of customer service while maintaining a good working relationship with fellow staff members.  He is an honest, reliable and punctual employee who always took pride in his appearance and set high standards for himself.

Whilst only a short term Brendan has proven to be totally reliable and trustworthy.  On Occasions releived as supercisor over a team of three other part-time staff, and been responsible to lock and secure the premises.  Needless to say he can be left to work unattended and have the work completed on time and to a very high standard.

In that time he has impressed me as a conscientious and hard working student.  His work is always well presented and shows considerable effort and thought.  .... His work as a librarian in the school library and his assistance with school computer equipment has been appreciated. ... Although he is quiet and a little reserved he has a good sense of humour.  His manner is generally cheerful and positive.

Brendan is well mannered, punctual and very patient in explaining how to use software programmes.  He has a good relationship with Staff and Students and has a very helpful manner.  I have greatlly appreciated his willing and cheerful help.  His knowledge of computers has been invaluable
